extendedInfo.description: Fight with other players and make your way to the top.There are 3 ways to punch a user:1.Punch random user: punch any available user on the server.After you punch him you will see his name and his force.2.Punch user from history: if a user punched you and you want to punch him back press that button.3.Punch a user in the TOP10.Each time you punch a user your force will increase with 1 and his force will decrease with 1 and you will be unavailable for a couple of seconds (usually 20). Be carefull, if your force becomes 0 you will be unavailable for 1 hour, until you recover your forces.Being a TOP10 user has its disadvantages: your name will apear in the top and everyone will be able to see and punch you.Internet Connection required.This is a free game but because internet connection is required if you don't connect through wifi some costs may apply.If you find a bug report it as soon as possible. Bugs may not be used to one's benefit. Abuse can lead to account deletion.Have fun!

reviews.comment: Ugly graphics but.good game when bored
reviews.author: A Google User
